entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being more than six feet tall and powerfully built, with a beard. He is also wearing new robes.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron looks up at Harry in awe, describing him as 'scary'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione tells Harry to take one of Mafalda's tokens and they should go. She is nervous.

entities.name: mafalda
entities.description: Mafalda is mentioned as having tokens that Hermione suggests Harry take.

entities.name: reg
entities.description: Reg is a wizard who greets another wizard in navy blue robes with 'Morning'.

relationships.description: Harry towers over Ron, making him look up at Harry in awe.
Hermione tells Harry to take one of Mafalda's tokens and they should go together.
Reg greets another wizard in navy blue robes with 'Morning'.
